item.title: Trump wants to ‘nationalize the voting,’ seeking to grab states’ power
item.description: Trump, who continues to falsely claim that he won the 2020 election, has baselessly alleged widespread fraud.

item.title: House GOP searches for votes to reopen government with razor-thin majority
item.description: House Democrats have indicated privately that they do not plan to support the plan, leaving Republicans to go it alone.

item.title: Justice Dept. demotes Ed Martin, stripping Trump ally of most authority
item.description: Top Justice Department officials have stripped Ed Martin of the bulk of his expansive responsibilities.

item.title: Trump team has $400 million, and 5 other campaign money takeaways
item.description: The Democratic Party on the national level has a mere fraction of what Republicans have heading into the 2026 midterms. Big donors like Elon Musk are ...

item.title: Trump family crypto firm sold major stake to UAE investment firm
item.description: The investment, worth a reported $500 million, gave Emirati-backed investors a 49 percent stake in World Liberty Financial, a Trump crypto company.
